typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		TransactionID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		StreamStart as string,
		StreamEnd as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SouthridgeTransaction
SouthridgeTransaction derive(SourceSystemID = ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
		GlobalTransactionID = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> DerivedColumnStreaming
DerivedColumnStreaming sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DFStreamingSouthridge
